attacks.name: Cunning Thrust
attacks.special: Re-roll all failed Hits against Monsters or Titans. These cannot be re-rolled again.

attacks.name: Lasso
attacks.special: 6" range. If a Critical Hit is rolled, the target may not move until the end of the round, and must achieve an Easy Feat to escape. A Character can be Lassoed by multiple Characters at the same time.
